title: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of an ultra-high-entropy rare earth orthoferrite (UHE REO) for overall water splitting (OWS)
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1540-1548
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01535A, Paper
Bui Manh Long, Thanh Son Cam, Anna S. Seroglazova, Artem A. Lobinsky, Evgeny Y. Gerasimov, Vadim I. Popkov
Using the two-step solution combustion method, nanocrystals of ultra-high-entropy rare-earth orthoferrite (UHE REO) were synthesized and used as effective catalysts for the hydrogen evolution reactions (HER) and oxygen evolutions (OER).
